SierpinskiTriangle

Class SierpinskiTriangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • SVGraphics.SVGraphics
      • SVGraphics.SVCustom
        • SierpinskiTriangle.SierpinskiTriangle

  • public class SierpinskiTriangle
extends SVCustom
    SierpinskiTriangle class extends SVCustom for building Sierpinski Triangle representing Towers of Hanoi moves.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      7-arg constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SierpinskiTriangle

        public SierpinskiTriangle(int id,
                  int disks,
                  int iteration,
                  int[] left,
                  int[] right,
                  int[] bottom,
                  java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> a)
        7-arg constructor. The logic can be greatly simplified as many of the vars passed are unnecessary information. The state of the game and the exact location of each disk can be provided by a simple formula. For larger numbers of disks, this is necessary.
